content: Is there a prebuilt release for mathlib4 that can be used instead of running lake build each time? If so, how do you use it? (I noticed lake said it "wanted" to use such a build.)
Ok, gotcha! (Not sure what this actually entails, so I didn't know if the github "builds" provided this somehow :sweat_smile:)
Thomas Murrills has marked this topic as resolved.
